title: Digital Layout Design Engineer
summary: Do you have a passion for crafting entirely new solutions? As part of our Digital Design Engineering group, you’ll take imaginative and revolutionary ideas and determine how to turn them into reality! Join us, and you’ll help design the tools that allow us to bring customers experiences they’ve never before envisioned.
description: Imagine yourself at the center of our SOC design effort, collaborating with all fields, playing a strategic role of getting functional products to millions of customers quickly. Join us to deliver PDV clean layout, working with the circuit design team, and exceed engineering specifications and expectations.
key_qualifications: We are looking for applicants experience in custom layout design of deep SubMicron CMOS circuits. High level proficiency in layout floorplanning, standard cell planning and hierarchical layout assembly. Good understanding of issues with RC delay, electromigration, self heating and cross capacitance. Excellent communication skills and able to work with multi-functional teams. Great skills on interpretation of CALIBRE DRC, ERC, LVS, etc. reports. Knowledge of MENTOR GRAPHICS or CADENCE layout tools
preferred_qualifications: Scripting skills in CSH, PERL or SKILL are considered a plus, but not required. Experience in layout automation is considered a plus, but not required. Experience in memory compiler development is considered a plus, but not required. Experience designing low noise, low power datapaths or Memory layout structures, etc.
education_experience: BS and a minimum of 3 years relevant industry experience.
